pr_title: Provides a helper which directly creates potentially long running que…

timeline.message:
Provides a helper which directly creates potentially long running queries on the statistics warehouse.

(Note, the queries are not made long running by the system but rather the framework will not report
these queries, as these are expected to be "slower" when crunching billions of rows).
